name: Deep Sixed
description: Deep Sixed is a roguelike space sim that will force you to use strategy, ingenuity and duct tape to keep your ship (and your skull) in one piece as you risk exploring a mysterious nebula protected by dangerous alien creatures.
minimum_requirements: Besturingssysteem: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.6 GHz Geheugen: 2 GB RAM Grafische kaart: OpenGL 2.1+ compatible, 1GB Video Ram Opslagruimte: 1200 MB beschikbare ruimte Aanvullende opmerkingen: Minimum display resolution: 1280x720
